title: twice after accepting a game to play, my screen turns black in champion selection
body: This happened twice, now i am penalized for closing my client and leaving the champion selection. I had no choice

replies.body: basically its not your fault but you still get punished for it. happens all the time

It sounds like your computer may be having a problem connecting to a service we call Maestro, which helps control Champion Select and lets all 10 players know what each other is doing.  While I'm not entirely sure why the connection doesn't go through, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664)!  It has the most common solutions to this issue and should get it resolved.

Give me a heads up if you are experiencing any further issues!
